TopicTitle: [Insert an original hello post title here]

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, I'm Giuseppe from Italy.

I saw a couple of Scott Manley's video on youtube and I see KSP. I love everything that can be lauched into space and, hopefully, don't explode so much. so i bought the game when on Steam sale.

So, here I am.

Feel free to add me on Steam, Glaivas is also my nick here.
[insert an original greeting post here. ]

Damn beat me to it!

Anyway, welcome to the most polite community so far!
Don't worry. Making things explode is one of the best parts of the game.

The wonderful thing about KSP is that it takes some intelligence to play, so you'll find very few trolls anywhere (except the occasional YouTube idiot who claims that "Its speled "moon' idiot"!"!!!!!)
ONE....I mean two words of advice.........MOAR BOOSTERS!

[insert an original hello post title here]

This is smart. By describing the problem, you have solved it. You will do well here.
